test_cases.test_name: Verify clean deployment of custom GxP application binaries
test_cases.objective: Ensure the validated production build is deployed to the application server without alteration and with verified cryptographic checksums.
prerequisites: Validated installation media stored in controlled location

test_steps.action: Compare SHA-256 checksums of installation package against released build manifest.
test_steps.expected_result: All file checksums match the manifest; no discrepancies observed.

test_steps.action: Execute automated installer with documented parameters and monitor log output.
test_steps.expected_result: Installer completes with exit code 0 and logs no critical errors.

data_integrity_requirements: Ensure authenticity of installation package (ALCOA+: Attributable, Authentic)

test_cases.test_name: Database schema installation and configuration validation
test_cases.objective: Confirm that the custom application schema is created exactly as per design specification with appropriate access controls.

test_steps.action: Run automated DDL deployment script in dry-run mode and review planned changes.
test_steps.expected_result: Script shows creation of all required tables, indexes, and audit triggers without errors.

test_steps.action: Execute DDL script in live mode and verify object counts post-install.
test_steps.expected_result: Object counts match design spec; audit triggers enabled on all data tables.

data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail objects present (ALCOA+: Contemporaneous, Complete)

test_cases.test_name: Application service start-up and environment parameter verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that the application services start successfully with correct JVM and environment parameters as defined in the configuration baseline.
prerequisites: Successful completion of OQ-001 and OQ-002

test_steps.action: Start application service via validated service control script.
test_steps.expected_result: Service reports status RUNNING within 60 seconds.

test_steps.action: Query runtime environment variables and JVM arguments.
test_steps.expected_result: Parameters match configuration baseline (heap size, log paths, time zone).

test_cases.test_name: Continuous temperature monitoring functional verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that the system records temperature readings every 5 minutes and stores them accurately within defined range limits.

test_steps.action: Simulate stable temperature of 5 °C for 20 minutes and observe data logger.
test_steps.expected_result: Exactly four readings are stored at 5-minute intervals with value 5 ±0.5 °C.

test_steps.action: Review database records for time stamps and value accuracy.
test_steps.expected_result: Time stamps are sequential and within tolerance; no missing records.

data_integrity_requirements: Recorded data must be accurate and complete (ALCOA+: Accurate, Complete)

test_cases.test_name: Temperature deviation alert and notification functional test
test_cases.objective: Confirm system generates an alert when temperature deviates ±2 °C from setpoint and logs the event with audit trail.

test_steps.action: Simulate rise to setpoint +3 °C and monitor alert queue.
test_steps.expected_result: Alert is generated within 60 seconds and email sent to configured users.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail entry associated with the alert event.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit record shows user, timestamp, old value, new value.

data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must be contemporaneous (ALCOA+: Contemporaneous)

test_cases.test_name: Electronic signature enforcement for critical temperature override
test_cases.objective: Verify that any manual override of critical temperature requires authenticated electronic signature with reason and meaning.

test_steps.action: Attempt to override critical temperature without e-signature credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: System blocks override and prompts for signature.

test_steps.action: Provide valid username/password and reason for change; execute override.
test_steps.expected_result: Override succeeds; signature details logged in audit trail.

data_integrity_requirements: Signature must be attributable and non-repudiable (ALCOA+: Attributable)

test_cases.test_name: Verify custom expiry date calculation algorithm accuracy
test_cases.objective: Ensure the application correctly calculates expiry dates based on product master data and manufacturing date implementing defined business rules.

test_steps.action: Enter manufacturing date 2023-01-15 for product with 24-month shelf life.
test_steps.expected_result: System calculates expiry 2025-01-14 considering leap-year rules.

test_steps.action: Repeat with 6-month shelf life product manufactured 2024-02-29.
test_steps.expected_result: System calculates expiry 2024-08-28 correctly handling leap day.

acceptance_criteria: Algorithm returns expected dates for both scenarios

test_cases.test_name: Out-of-Specification (OOS) rule execution for analytical results
test_cases.objective: Validate custom business logic that triggers OOS investigation workflow when analytical result exceeds specification limits.

test_steps.action: Enter result 11.0 where spec upper limit is 10.5.
test_steps.expected_result: System flags result as OOS and initiates investigation task.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail for rule execution details.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail shows rule ID, user, timestamp, variable values.

test_cases.test_name: User role-based access control verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that Analyst, Reviewer, and QA Approver roles have appropriate permissions in accordance with URS.
prerequisites: User accounts created for each role

test_steps.action: Log in as Analyst and attempt to approve a test result.
test_steps.expected_result: Access denied with clear message.

test_steps.action: Log in as QA Approver and approve the same result.
test_steps.expected_result: Approval succeeds and signature recorded.

data_integrity_requirements: Role enforcement supports data integrity (ALCOA+: Consistent)

test_cases.test_name: Two-stage electronic review workflow functional test
test_cases.objective: Ensure results undergo Analyst review followed by independent QA approval before final release.

test_steps.action: Submit result as Analyst and perform first-stage review.
test_steps.expected_result: Status changes to Reviewed pending QA approval.

test_steps.action: Log in as QA Approver and approve result.
test_steps.expected_result: Status changes to Approved and locked for editing.

test_cases.test_name: Electronic worksheet calculation accuracy for pH method
test_cases.objective: Validate that electronic worksheet performs pH slope calculation correctly according to method equation.

test_steps.action: Enter calibration points (pH 4.00, 7.00, 10.00) and raw mV values.
test_steps.expected_result: Worksheet calculates slope between 95-105 %.

test_steps.action: Compare worksheet result with manual spreadsheet.
test_steps.expected_result: Results match within 0.1 %.

test_cases.test_name: Negative test for invalid numeric entry in electronic worksheet
test_cases.objective: Confirm the worksheet rejects alphabetic characters in numeric fields and logs the attempt.

test_steps.action: Enter letters "ABC" in numeric mV field.
test_steps.expected_result: System displays validation error and prevents save.

test_steps.action: Review audit trail for validation failure entry.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail records rejected entry with user ID.

test_cases.test_name: Boundary test for maximum batch number length
test_cases.objective: Verify system accepts 10 character batch numbers and rejects 11 characters per URS definition.

test_steps.action: Enter 10-character batch number "BATCH12345".
test_steps.expected_result: System accepts the value without error.

test_steps.action: Enter 11-character batch number "BATCH123456".
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects input and displays length error.

test_cases.test_name: Error handling and automatic recovery after application crash
test_cases.objective: Assess the application's ability to recover unsaved data and resume operations after simulated crash.

test_steps.action: Simulate crash by terminating process during active data entry.
test_steps.expected_result: Process terminates; monitoring detects failure.

test_steps.action: Restart service and reopen previously edited record.
test_steps.expected_result: Unsaved data recovered or user notified of recovery options.

test_cases.test_name: SAP ERP interface data transfer integration test
test_cases.objective: Verify successful bidirectional data exchange between LIMS and SAP using vendor adapter.

test_steps.action: Send sample release status from LIMS to SAP and monitor IDoc processing.
test_steps.expected_result: IDoc processed without error; status updated in SAP.

test_steps.action: Pull raw material batch list from SAP into LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch list imported accurately with all required fields.

test_cases.test_name: Real-time equipment data interface integration test
test_cases.objective: Ensure analytical instrument sends results automatically to LIMS via middleware without data loss.

test_steps.action: Run instrument sample and monitor middleware queue.
test_steps.expected_result: Result file appears in queue within 30 seconds.

test_steps.action: Verify record in LIMS matches instrument result exactly.
test_steps.expected_result: Numeric values identical; metadata preserved.

test_cases.test_name: Archive and restore mechanism integration verification
test_cases.objective: Verify that seven-year archival process correctly moves data to archive and allows full restore.

test_steps.action: Execute archive job for data older than 7 years.
test_steps.expected_result: Job completes successfully and logs archived record count.

test_steps.action: Perform restore of one archived batch record.
test_steps.expected_result: Record restored with intact audit trail.

test_cases.test_name: Stability protocol configuration data flow integration test
test_cases.objective: Confirm configured stability study protocols propagate correctly to scheduling and reporting modules.

test_steps.action: Create new stability study using configured template.
test_steps.expected_result: Study appears in schedule with correct pull points.

test_steps.action: Generate interim report and confirm protocol parameters displayed.
test_steps.expected_result: Report shows correct protocol metadata.

acceptance_criteria: Schedule and report reflect template values

test_cases.test_name: Baseline performance test under normal load
test_cases.objective: Measure application response time with 100 concurrent users to ensure it meets ≤2 s average response criterion.

test_steps.action: Execute scripted transactions simulating 100 users for 30 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: Average response ≤2 s; error rate <0.1 %.

test_steps.action: Review server CPU and memory utilization.
test_steps.expected_result: Utilization stays below 75 %.

test_cases.test_name: Stress test under peak load with 500 concurrent users
test_cases.objective: Determine system stability and identify failure thresholds during extreme load.

test_steps.action: Ramp to 500 users over 10 minutes and hold for 20 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: System remains operational; response ≤5 s; no crashes.

test_steps.action: Monitor logs for memory leaks or unhandled exceptions.
test_steps.expected_result: No critical exceptions or out-of-memory errors.

test_cases.test_name: Database query optimization performance test
test_cases.objective: Validate execution time of top-10 heavy SQL queries is within 300 ms after indexing.

test_steps.action: Execute captured heavy queries and record execution time.
test_steps.expected_result: Each query completes ≤300 ms.

test_steps.action: Check execution plans for index usage.
test_steps.expected_result: Planned indexes used as designed.

data_integrity_requirements: Efficient queries ensure timely data (ALCOA+: Timely)

test_cases.test_name: Failover performance test during high availability switch
test_cases.objective: Measure transaction loss and downtime during automatic failover between clustered nodes.

test_steps.action: Simulate node failure while running 50 user load.
test_steps.expected_result: Failover completes within 30 seconds; zero transaction loss.

test_steps.action: Verify audit trail continuity across nodes.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail entries continuous with no gaps.

test_cases.test_name: Penetration test for SQL injection vulnerability
test_cases.objective: Assess application inputs for susceptibility to SQL injection attacks and verify mitigation controls.

test_steps.action: Run automated SQL injection scan against all form inputs.
test_steps.expected_result: No successful injection payloads; application returns sanitized errors.

test_steps.action: Manually test high-risk field with payload "' OR 1=1 --".
test_steps.expected_result: Query parameterized; no data leakage.

test_cases.test_name: Cross-site scripting (XSS) security test on result entry screens
test_cases.objective: Verify application properly escapes and sanitizes user input to prevent XSS attacks.

test_steps.action: Inject script tag <script>alert('XSS')</script> into comment field.
test_steps.expected_result: System rejects input or stores it in escaped form; no script executed.

test_steps.action: Review stored data in database.
test_steps.expected_result: Input stored as plain text with tags neutralized.

test_cases.test_name: Role escalation attempt security negative test
test_cases.objective: Ensure user cannot escalate privileges by manipulating JWT token or session cookie.

test_steps.action: Intercept session token and modify role claim to "QA Approver".
test_steps.expected_result: Server rejects modified token and logs security event.

test_steps.action: Attempt privileged action with tampered token.
test_steps.expected_result: Action denied; user logged out.

test_cases.test_name: Audit trail completeness verification for create, modify, delete events
test_cases.objective: Verify that every CRUD operation on critical data is captured with user, timestamp, old value, new value.

test_steps.action: Create new record and note audit entry.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail captures creation with all required fields.

test_steps.action: Modify and delete the record; review audit entries.
test_steps.expected_result: Modify and delete events recorded with before/after values.

test_cases.test_name: Time synchronization data integrity test
test_cases.objective: Ensure application server time is synchronized with NTP to prevent audit trail time drift.

test_steps.action: Compare server time with NTP source.
test_steps.expected_result: Drift ≤1 second.

test_steps.action: Review audit entries before and after forced drift correction.
test_steps.expected_result: No timestamp overlap or disorder.

test_cases.test_name: Data retention policy enforcement test
test_cases.objective: Validate system prevents deletion of records before 7-year retention period expires.
prerequisites: Test data with future expiry date

test_steps.action: Attempt to delete record dated 2 years old.
test_steps.expected_result: System blocks deletion and displays policy message.

test_steps.action: Attempt to delete record older than 7 years after archive restore.
test_steps.expected_result: Deletion permitted following required approval workflow.

test_cases.test_name: Backup encryption integrity verification
test_cases.objective: Confirm that database backups are encrypted using AES-256 and can be successfully decrypted for restore.

test_steps.action: Execute backup job and verify encryption flag.
test_steps.expected_result: Backup completes with encryption enabled.

test_steps.action: Decrypt backup and perform checksum comparison with source.
test_steps.expected_result: Checksums match; data integrity preserved.

data_integrity_requirements: Encrypted backups assure authenticity and durability (ALCOA+)

test_cases.test_name: User interface functional smoke test for critical workflows
test_cases.objective: Perform high-level functional smoke test across all primary user workflows to confirm readiness for UAT.

test_steps.action: Navigate through sample login, test entry, review, approval, and reporting modules.
test_steps.expected_result: No unexpected errors; workflows complete successfully.

test_steps.action: Generate summary report and export to PDF.
test_steps.expected_result: Report generated correctly; PDF signed with system certificate.

acceptance_criteria: All workflows execute without fatal errors
